name: Spook's Candy Adventure
description:
Make your way through the neighborhood, gathering candy and TP'ing houses, all while avoiding the spooky kids: whose costumes have turned real!

Controls:

A and D: Move left and right

Space: Jump

Mouse: Aim

Left click: Throw egg at enemy

Hold right click: Show arc of toilet paper

Release right click: Throw toilet paper

R: Restart

Made by Kaylin Beck (art and design) and John Suereth (programming and design) for Becker College's 51-hour October Jam!
